data.name: Don't Starve Together: Fresh Verdant Chest
data.detailed_description:
Fresh Verdant Chest

Surround yourself in the splendour of the natural world with these freshly picked outfits! In this Fresh Verdant Chest you can find the seven newest Verdant skin sets, wearable in-game by your favorite Don’t Starve Together characters.

Includes
  • Walter's Verdant Skin Set
  • Warly's Verdant Skin Set
  • Webber's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wendy’s Verdant Skin Set
  • Wortox's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wilson's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wolfgang's Verdant Skin Set
data.about_the_game:
Fresh Verdant Chest

Surround yourself in the splendour of the natural world with these freshly picked outfits! In this Fresh Verdant Chest you can find the seven newest Verdant skin sets, wearable in-game by your favorite Don’t Starve Together characters.

Includes

  • Webber's Verdant Skin Set

  • Wilson's Verdant Skin Set

data.short_description: This Fresh Verdant Chest contains the second addition to the Verdant skin series. Contains skins for: Walter, Warly, Webber, Wendy, Wortox, Wilson, and Wolfgang.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
